question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: Which club did Vittorio Triarico play for in 2026?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

Title: The Pride of Lecce: Vittorio Triarico's Journey with U.S. Lecce

In the picturesque city of Lecce, nestled in the heel of Italy's boot, a sense of pride and passion resonates through the streets. It's a city where football is not just a sport, but a way of life. And at the heart of this fervor is U.S. Lecce, the beloved football club that has been the pride of the city since 1908. Among the talented players who don the iconic red and yellow jersey is Vittorio Triarico, a skilled Italian association football player who has made a name for himself in the world of Italian football. Growing up in the southern region of Apulia, Triarico was always drawn to the beautiful game. As a young boy, he would spend hours kicking the ball around with his friends in the narrow streets of Lecce, dreaming of one day representing his hometown club. That dream became a reality when Triarico joined U.S. Lecce's youth academy, where he honed his skills under the watchful eyes of experienced coaches. As Triarico progressed through the ranks, his talent and dedication did not go unnoticed. In 2018, he made his professional debut for U.S. Lecce in a Serie C match against Virtus Francavilla. The 2-1 victory marked the beginning of an incredible journey for Triarico, who would go on to become an integral part of the team. One of the most significant pieces of evidence supporting Triarico's affiliation with U.S. Lecce is his consistent presence in the team's matchday squads. According to official records, Triarico has made over 50 appearances for the club, scoring crucial goals and providing assists that have contributed to the team's success. His impressive performances have earned him recognition from fans and critics alike, with many praising his vision, agility, and goal-scoring ability. Further evidence of Triarico's connection to U.S. Lecce can be found in the numerous interviews and articles featuring the player. In a 2020 interview with local newspaper, La Gazzetta del Mezzogiorno, Triarico expressed his gratitude to the club for giving him the opportunity to represent his hometown. "Playing for U.S. Lecce is a dream come true," he said.
content.source_2:
**Vittorio Triarico**

Vittorio Triarico (born 2002) is an Italian association football player who currently plays for A.C. Legnano in the Italian football league system. **Early Life and Career**

Triarico was born in Milan, Italy, on August 12, 2002. He began playing football at a young age, joining the youth academy of A.C. Milan at the age of 8. He spent 10 years in the academy, progressing through the ranks and eventually making his professional debut for the club's reserve team in 2020. **Professional Career**

In 2025, Triarico transferred to Serie C club, U.S. Pergolettese, where he spent two seasons, making 64 appearances and scoring 12 goals. His impressive performances caught the attention of A.C. Legnano, who signed him in 2027. **A.C. Legnano (2027-present)**

Triarico has been an integral part of the A.C. Legnano team since his arrival in 2027. He has made over 150 appearances for the club, scoring 35 goals and providing 20 assists. In the 2035-2036 season, he helped the team win promotion to Serie B, scoring 10 goals in 30 appearances. In 2039, Triarico continues to play for A.C. Legnano, who are currently competing in Serie B. He has been praised for his pace, skill, and vision on the pitch, earning him a reputation as one of the top players in the league. **International Career**

Triarico has represented Italy at various youth levels, including the U-19 and U-21 teams. He made his debut for the Italy U-21 team in 2023, scoring a goal in a 3-2 win over Sweden.
